title: Help me please
body: my league cilent said that i am unable to connect to the authentication server. Can anyone help me please

replies.body: I uninstalled, I replugged my router, I allowed league to access firewall, I used hex tech tool, I troubleshooted nothing seems to work!!!!!!!!!!
Same i did the same thing

> [{quoted}](name=DeltaTP,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4kxAW2GR,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-12-25T23:41:27.171+0000)
>
> Same i did the same thing

Did yours work?
RIOT JUST HELP US PLEASE I FEEL LIKE YOU DON T CARE ABOUT US
RIOT IT CHRISTMAS BREAK I WANT TO PLAY LEAGUE JUST HELP ME PLEASE
i don t know what to do and my wifi is good.
can anyone in riot help us please
i don t want to uninstall my client
Im having the same issue been trying to figure it out for hours

Can everyone here list the version of windows they're using, all installed antivirus products, and the name of their ISPs? A couple people have reported this and we haven't changed anything on our authentication services, so we're trying to determine if it's due to a bad antivirus update.
i am using a acer laptop my cable is MTS and i am using a window 10

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Daguava,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4kxAW2GR,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-12-26T04:01:53.003+0000)
>
> Can everyone here list the version of windows they're using, all installed antivirus products, and the name of their ISPs? A couple people have reported this and we haven't changed anything on our authentication services, so we're trying to determine if it's due to a bad antivirus update.

Im on a MacBook Air it was working fine last night and I logged in this morning and got this message saying unable to connect to authenticator

> [{quoted}](name=Spirit Seer Udyr,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4kxAW2GR,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-12-26T05:10:06.640+0000)
>
> Im on a MacBook Air it was working fine last night and I logged in this morning and got this message saying unable to connect to authenticator

And im using Time Warner cable

I play League on this brand new laptop gaming, intel core i7- 7700, Nvidia GeForce gtx, Windows 10, Windows Defender. My ping is normally 27, and for some reason, I can't log in for 4 days in a row. Can you help? 
4 days ago, I can't log in.
3 days ago, I logged in and played 2 games.
2 days ago until today, I can't log in. 
What is going on?
please riot fix this quick. i really want to play league {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
